description:
For many years, the Ys series has been an exceptional action RPG franchise. It arguably reached new highs with Ys 8: Lacrimosa of Dana and Ys 9: Monstrum Nox, yet there was still hype for Ys 10: Nordics. Having shifted to Falcom's new engine and promising a larger scale, it seemed poised to elevate the series even higher.

The truth is a little more complicated. Set earlier in Adol's life, Ys 10: Nordics sees him teaming with Karja Balta to battle the Griegr. All the while, he must unravel the mystery of their plans and the Normans' history. Alongside sailing and ship combat, it also features a new combat system focused on parrying and dual attacks.

It's a lot, and while some mechanics can be enjoyable, I have my share of nitpicks. Don't get me wrong - Ys 10: Nordics is enjoyable, but longtime fans should know what they're getting into.
title: Ys X: Nordics Review - The Final Verdict

description:
Within this curated list, you’ll find games from a multitude of genres and styles. There are no games before 2001 here, so it’s a somewhat modern collection of 10/10 games featured here. 

No game on this list is perfect, but they all demonstrate the highest bar in quality in their respective genre despite minor imperfections. Also, every game mentioned here is available in some way or another on modern platforms, so you can give them a shot no matter the system. 

Surprisingly, plenty of the games on this list are from this year or the year prior, proving that gaming hasn’t been ‘dead’ or declining like some suggest.

 Sure, some of these are remakes, but they do enough to differentiate themselves from the original to constitute as a separate experience, as is the case with Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth.
title: 15 Almost Flawless 10/10 Video Games YOU CAN'T IGNORE

description:
Nintendo has done a better job of keeping the Switch fed with solid games in its final year than most of us would have expected, the company is also set to release a new Mario Party game. 

The series is always one that fans flock to in droves, and with Super Maro Party Jamboree, we’re being promised an expansive and chaotic new instalment that is not only looking set to be brimming with a host of content, but also intriguing new modes, mechanics, and ways of playing. 

Ahead of the game’s release not long from now, here, we are going to go over a few key details that you should know about Super Mario Party Jamboree.
title: Super Mario Party Jamboree - 14 Things You NEED TO KNOW Before You Buy
